query:
-- Get the SAQ Lab program ID
SET @saq_lab_id = (SELECT id FROM programs WHERE slug = 'saq-lab' LIMIT 1);

-- Add Tuesday schedule
INSERT INTO schedules (programId, title, dayOfWeek, startTime, endTime, location, sessionType, isRecurring, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  @saq_lab_id,
  'SAQ Lab - Tuesday',
  'tuesday',
  '2026-01-07 19:00:00',
  '2026-01-07 20:00:00',
  'The Academy Training Facility',
  'regular',
  true,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Add Thursday schedule
INSERT INTO schedules (programId, title, dayOfWeek, startTime, endTime, location, sessionType, isRecurring, createdAt, updatedAt)
VALUES (
  @saq_lab_id,
  'SAQ Lab - Thursday',
  'thursday',
  '2026-01-09 19:00:00',
  '2026-01-09 20:00:00',
  'The Academy Training Facility',
  'regular',
  true,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
